NK008(nya)008:0: gshin rje gdong drug gi brgyud 'debs ni /
NK008(nya)008:1: kun bzang rdor 'chang 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed //
NK008(nya)008:2: gsang bdag dga' rab 'jam dpal bshes gnyen zhabs //
NK008(nya)008:3: pad+ma thod phreng bal po nor 'dzin bzang //
NK008(nya)008:4: gsol ba 'debs so don gnyis lhun grub shog /
NK008(nya)008:5: gnubs chen sangs ye yon tan rgya mtsho'i dpal //
NK008(nya)008:6: pad+ma dbang rgyal chen po 'jam dpal ba //
NK008(nya)008:7: jo mo so rgad bza' dang ye shes gzungs //
NK008(nya)008:8: gsol ba 'debs so zhang btsun 'khor 'bar rig 'dzin zhang rgyal mtshan //
NK008(nya)008:9: lcags spyil ba dang dkon mchog bzang po grags //
NK008(nya)008:10: sgrol chen bsam rdor rnam rgyal bzang po la //
NK008(nya)008:11: gsol ba 'debs so chos rgyal bshes gnyen nam mkha' dpal ldan che //
NK008(nya)008:12: nam mkha' grags pa chos rgyal dpal bzang po //
NK008(nya)008:13: kun bzang ba dang ngag dbang rdo rje la //
NK008(nya)008:14: gsol ba 'debs so rnam rgyal rdo rje dpal ldan bkra shis grags //
NK008(nya)008:15: se ston legs grub rgya ston chos dbyings mtshan //
NK008(nya)008:16: brgyud srol kun 'dus rig 'dzin gter bdag gling //
NK008(nya)008:17: gsol ba 'debs so rin chen rnam rgyal pad+ma bstan 'dzin rje //
NK008(nya)008:18: phrin las rnam rgyal pad+ma dbang gi rgyal //
NK008(nya)008:19: mi 'gyur nam rdor dri med bshes gnyen rtsal //
NK008(nya)008:20: gsol ba 'debs so lung rtogs bstan nyi 'jigs med kun dga' bzang //
NK008(nya)008:21: bstan 'dzin nor bu kun 'dus 'khor lo'i mgon //
NK008(nya)008:22: 'gyur med phan bde'i 'od zer dpal 'bar la //
NK008(nya)008:23: gsol ba 'debs so rab 'byams dkyil 'khor kun gtso yi dam lha //
NK008(nya)008:24: gnas gsum mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs //
NK008(nya)008:25: snang srid rnam dag dkyil 'khor chen po la //
NK008(nya)008:26: gsol ba 'debs so kun brtags srid pa'i 'khor lor snang ba'i chos //
NK008(nya)008:27: yongs grub ye shes 'khor lo'i rol par sad //
NK008(nya)008:28: mnyam nyid bde chen 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ches //
NK008(nya)008:29: srid zhi'i chos kun dbang bsgyur mthu thob shog /
NK008(nya)008:30: ces gshin rje gdong drug gi smin byed brgyud pa'i
NK008(nya)008:31: khyad par phyogs gcig la gsol ba 'debs pa 'adi'ang
